data.eml:eml: Characterization of Pleurotinae, with review of Pleurota species close to P. aristella (Linnaeus) from Morocco (Lepidoptera: Gelechioidea: Oecophoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaila, Lauri, Mutanen, Marko, Sihvonen, Pasi, Tyllinen, Juha, Tabell, Jukka (2019): Characterization of Pleurotinae, with review of Pleurota species close to P. aristella (Linnaeus) from Morocco (Lepidoptera: Gelechioidea: Oecophoridae). Zootaxa 4545 (4): 451-477, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.4.1
